TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CompilationMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定义一些常量以指定 ASP.NET 应如何编译 .aspx 页和 .ascx 控件。

span.span: Defines constants that specify how ASP.NET should compile .aspx pages and .ascx controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 枚举值指示页或控件是否应在运行时编译。The enumeration values indicate whether a page or control should be compiled at run time. 如果未指定编译模式, 则默认值始终为。When no compilation mode is specified, the default value is Always. 将页设置为从不使用 "从不" 特性进行编译将通过 disqualifying 编译过程中的指定页来提高性能。Setting a page to never compile using the Never attribute will increase performance by disqualifying the specified page in the compilation process. 若要定义特定于页的属性 (该属性指定 .aspx、.ascx 或 .master 文件不应在页面级别编译), 可以使用如下所示的指令:To define a page-specific attribute that specifies an .aspx, .ascx or .master file should not be compiled at the page level, you can use a directive like the following: `<%@ page compilationMode="never" %>` 还可以在配置文件中指定编译模式。The compilation mode can also be specified in configuration files. 配置节对象标识特定于页的配置设置。The configuration section object identifies page-specific configuration settings. [页面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458)配置节元素可在配置文件的计算机、站点、应用程序和子目录级别进行声明。The [pages](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458) configuration section element can be declared at the machine, site, application, and subdirectory levels of the configuration files. 如果设置为 "从不" 且页面包含需要编译的脚本块或代码构造, 则 ASP.NET 将返回错误, 并且不会运行页面。If the is set to Never and a page contains a script block or code construct that requires compilation, ASP.NET will return with an error and the page will not run. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 page 指令指示绝不应编译页面。The following code example demonstrates how to use the page directive to indicate that a page should never be compiled. [!code-aspx-csharp[CompilationMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CompilationMode/CS/compilationmode_cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CompilationMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CompilationMode/VB/compilationmode_vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.CompilationMode Always = int32(2)

span.span: The page should always be compiled.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.CompilationMode Auto = int32(0)

summary.span: 如果可能，ASP.NET 将不编译页面。

span.span: ASP.NET will not compile the page, if possible.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.CompilationMode Never = int32(1)

summary.span: 在任何情况下都不应动态编译页面或控件。

span.span: The page or control should never be dynamically compiled.
